hints.title: Empirical Validation Protocol
hints.content:
844: :label: alg-validation-protocol
845: 
846: **Test Cases**:
847: 
848: 1. **Uniform Random Walk** (p_clone = 0):
849:    - N walkers performing pure SDE evolution in a bounded domain
850:    - Measure: Time per timestep as a function of N
851:    - Expected: Linear scaling O(N)
852: 
853: 2. **High Cloning Rate** (p_clone = 0.5):
854:    - Frequent teleportation events
855:    - Measure: Time per timestep, comparison to batch
856:    - Expected: O(N log N), but with better constants than batch
857: 
858: 3. **Localized Cloning**:
859:    - Cloning events concentrated in a subregion
860:    - Tests spatial locality exploitation
861:    - Expected: Sublinear dependence on N for updates outside the active region
862: 
863: 4. **Realistic Fragile Simulation**:
864:    - Full Euclidean Gas or Adaptive Gas run
865:    - Measure: Total time for geometric analysis over 10⁴ timesteps
866:    - Compare: Batch vs. online algorithm
867: 
868: **Metrics to Report**:
869: - Wall-clock time per timestep
870: - Number of Lawson flips per walker update
871: - Memory usage
872: - Scaling exponent (fit log(T) vs. log(N))
873: 
874: **Target Platforms**:
875: - CPU: Intel Xeon or AMD EPYC (high core count)
